tool.name: Get the terms that are related
tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
Collects the terms that are related by a concrete relationship type (e.g. is_a)
**Example**
If you ask for terms related by the relationship type 'participates_in' you will get tab delimited records like::
PR:0000001 participates_in GO:0000023 PR:0000002 participates_in GO:0033224 PR:0000003 participates_in GO:0021109 PR:0000004 participates_in GO:0034099 ... ...
